name: Harvesting
details: When Crops Are ready to hervest you can call me. I am expert in hervesting for 10 years. I know How to be gentel with crops so that the crops wont get damage

name: Planting
details: Need a hand to plant your crops? I am always here I know when to plant and how to plant. I am expert in planting so that you can rest a little from your side. I got your back

name: Damge Control
details: Worring about your crop if it will fall if the strom hit? Here I am I can give you a hand to help you out.

name: Watering
details: Need a hand to water your field? You an count on me. Too much water can kill your crop. I can advide and give you a hand

name: Fartilizing
details: Wooring about low production fertilizing is the solution. Coosing the right thing is very important ask from me I am an expert on this.

name: Packing
details: Nedd to store or sell your product? Packegung is important. Wrong packeging can loose you thousands. I am here to help you to advise and help you

name: Bedding
details: Before planting bedding is important wrong bedding can loose you more. Always get advise and hand from an expert. I am here to guide you make the perfect ped for your crop!
